photos.caption: Tomorrow Sunday April 21st, we are praying for my complete healing for the glory of God. üôèüôèüôèüôè

Hello my dear friends. As you know after listening to my testimony a few times, my journey through cancer has been about growing closer to God as He has healed my soul. By His Glory my experience has allowed others to find encouragement and hope for their own journey. I have embraced cancer as a cleansing time for my spirit and offered my life to God as an instrument, knowing that having terminal cancer is a painful experience but accepting a difficult path over my own desires to shine His love, peace and joy. In the past weeks, I have been approached  by different friends about their vision in my life for a complete healing and now I feel in my spirit that is time for me to declare God‚Äôs power to make a miracle and continue to use my journey to show His Glory. I felt this morning in my praying time that I should dedicate a specific time to pray and invite others to do it with me. We are asking God for a miracle, for complete healing by His power and for His Glory. We don‚Äôt need to be together in the same location but united in spirit at same time asking for God‚Äôs mercy. Also, I want to fast before my prayer time, not as a way to win God‚Äôs grace but to give more focus to His voice and receive guidance.

Here is the invitation: 
I will start fasting Saturday April 20th at noon and culminate it in prayer with my Christian family, Sunday 21st at 8:00 am.

I don‚Äôt expect everyone to fast but if you can join me on Sunday at 8 am Eastern time from anywhere you are, I believe God will listen to us and deliver His Grace and Mercy over me once again. Thank you for your love. "Again, truly I tell you that if two of you on earth agree about anything they ask for, it will be done for them by my Father in heaven. Matthew 18:19
My daughter is doing a fundraiser for our family. Thank you in advance for sharing. https://www.gofundme.com/the-nichols-family-a-time-for-healing

The joy and peace that I have are not the result of a positive mentality. Learning about the unconditional love of God in the Bible and understanding that my life has purpose is what brought me true happiness. Temporary things give us temporary happiness but the love of God is eternal and brings eternal happiness.
I updated my blog today https://www.aydasjourney.com/about-me/?m=1

True love is...
He is always good!
True love is actions.
When we don't understand what is happening in our life, we need to walk by faith. God always has a purpose.
When things don't go your way... "Be thankful in all circumstances for this is Gods will for you "
I am a work in progress by my maker.
Regardless of how you feel about God, His love for you is never ending.
Becauce we love our father we want to respect Him and do what is right.
It is difficult to wait for that good future that God promised us, specially during difficult times but faith will carry you through just give your worries to the Lord.
Our faith is tested so we can everyday become more like Christ. Hang in there, your blessings are coming. ‚úùÔ∏è
Disgusting! Usually I don't like to be negative but this is just not ok.

"They will live even though they die". I believe.
The love of Christ has set me free from my fears. I live in peace.
Because his blood I am still alive.  Happy Palm Sunday.
Through life we don't find many of these, so stick to the ones you find.
Lord, reveal your will to us and give us wisdom to understand it.

Tolerance.

Real love, real kindness, real mercy.

True love! His last prayer was for us.

May my words today help to build others.
To my beautiful Seniors! ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§

Is the only way I find peace.
Kind words are fresh air to me. These notes help me stay hopeful every day.Thank you!

Hey! My oncologist called today! Christmas day, to tell me that I do have a gene that has developed medicine for it! Which means I can start treatment soon and have a very good prognostic for this fight! Yay! I will tell you more details later when I meet him but this is definitely  a response to prayers, thank you!
My Christmas wish for all of us is that we find peace in our heart to glorify our Lord in any circumstance, because that is why Jesus was send to us.
48 love notes! Best medicine in the world. God provides His mercies in disguise for every trouble I ran into.

Praying for strength. Only through Christ I can endure this trial.
Finding hope, purpose and direction in the word of God.
